data.name: PAYDAY 2: Dragon Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Payday Gang travels to Chinatown, San Francisco, to mount a daring heist against an operation run by the infamous Golden Dagger Triad. The objective: to steal a priceless golden dragon statue.

This DLC includes a new heist as well as a tailor set with new masks, outfits and gloves.

The Heist: Dragon Heist

The Payday Gang must approach through the streets of Chinatown and infiltrate the triad operation which is hidden behind a tea shop. Once inside, it’s about finding and extracting the priceless dragon statue, by any means necessary.

The heist is available in both stealth and loud, and has a variety of preplanning options to allow players to customize their approach.

Tea Shop Tailor Set

Masks
  • Mahakala
  • Laughing Dragon
  • Shouting Dragon
  • Serenity

Outfits (each of these has 4 color variations, for a total of 8 outfits):
  • Wushu
  • Triad Casual

Gloves
  • Black Dragon Claws
  • Flame Grip
  • Red Dragon Claws
  • Burnout Champ

As an addition to the paid content, all PAYDAY 2 players will receive the Crimson Goldflower weapon color and the Dragon Bomber outfit for free.

data.short_description: The Payday Gang is back with a new heist and new cosmetics, stealing a priceless gold dragon statue in Chinatown, San Francisco.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
